mechanics.condition: Target is a beast or humanoid within range for the entire casting time
mechanics.outcome: Create an illusory duplicate creature of the target, partially real and formed from ice or snow
Simulacrum has half the original creature's hit point maximum
Simulacrum is formed without any equipment
Simulacrum uses all statistics of the duplicated creature, except HP and equipment
Simulacrum is friendly to the caster and designated creatures, obeys caster's spoken commands, and acts on caster's turn in combat
Simulacrum cannot learn, become more powerful, increase its level or other abilities, or regain expended spell slots

mechanics.condition: Caster has access to an alchemical laboratory and 100 gp worth of rare herbs and minerals
mechanics.outcome: Caster can repair the simulacrum, restoring 1 hit point for every 100 gp spent
Simulacrum reverts to snow, melts, and is instantly destroyed

mechanics.condition: Any simulacra created by this caster are currently active
mechanics.outcome: Any currently active simulacra created by this caster are instantly destroyed

description_text: You shape an illusory duplicate of one beast or humanoid that is within range for the entire casting time of the spell. The duplicate is a creature, partially real and formed from ice or snow, and it can take actions and otherwise be affected as a normal creature. It appears to be the same as the original, but it has half the creature's hit point maximum and is formed without any equipment. Otherwise, the illusion uses all the statistics of the creature it duplicates.The simulacrum is friendly to you and creatures you designate. It obeys your spoken commands, moving and acting in accordance with your wishes and acting on your turn in combat. The simulacrum lacks the ability to learn or become more powerful, so it never increases its level or other abilities, nor can it regain expended spell slots.If the simulacrum is damaged, you can repair it in an alchemical laboratory, using rare herbs and minerals worth 100 gp per hit point it regains. The simulacrum lasts until it drops to 0 hit points, at which point it reverts to snow and melts instantly.If you cast this spell again, any currently active duplicates you created with this spell are instantly destroyed.
